quotes.quote:
He who has a thousand friends has not a friend to spare,
And he who has one enemy will meet him everywhere.
quotes.author: Ali ibn-Abi-Talib

quotes.quote: Misfortune shows those who are not really friends.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Without friends no one would choose to live, though he had all other goods.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Friendship make prosperity more shining and lessens adversity by dividing and sharing it.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The shifts of Fortune test the reliability of friends.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: It is wise to apply the oil of refined politeness to the mechanisms of friendship.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: Being friendless taught me how to be a friend. Funny how that works.
quotes.author: Colleen Wainwright

quotes.quote: Have no friends not equal to yourself.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Do not protect yourself by a fence, but rather by your friends.
quotes.author: Czech Proverb

quotes.quote: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: My mother used to say that there are no strangers, only friends you haven't met yet. She's now in a maximum security twilight home in Australia.
quotes.author: Dame Edna Everage

quotes.quote: Friends were like clothes: fine while they lasted but eventually they wore thin or you grew out of them.
quotes.author: David Shore

quotes.quote: You're supposed to trust friends. You have no reason to be his friend? That is part of the pleasure of friendship: trusting without absolute evidence and then being rewarded for that trust.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Never explain--your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Nothing changes your opinion of a friend so surely as success - yours or his.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence. True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: Nobody sees a flower - really - it is so small it takes time - we haven't time - and to see takes time, like to have a friend takes time.
quotes.author: Hugh Elliott

quotes.quote: All people want is someone to listen.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: When the character of a man is not clear to you, look at his friends.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Go through your phone book, call people and ask them to drive you to the airport. The ones who will drive you are your true friends. The rest aren't bad people; they're just acquaintances.
quotes.author: John Churton Collins

quotes.quote: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: True happiness is of a retired nature, and an enemy to pomp and noise; it arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of one's self, and in the next from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
quotes.author: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.quote: There is nothing like the razor sharp tongue of a good friend to cut through the lies we tell ourselves.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: It isn't kind to cultivate a friendship just so one will have an audience.
A good friend of my son's is a son to me.
Adversity does teach who your real friends are.
